oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Photograph of Horatio Kinchen Stokes and Frances Elizabeth Phillips Stokes
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Horatio Kinchen Stokes, a Confederate veteran from Bedford County, Tenn., is pictured with his wife, Frances. He served as a private in Co. H, 44th Tenn. Inf. Regt., CSA. Stokes is bearded and wearing a suit and tie; his wife is wearing a striped blouse. The photograph is in a black oval paper frame.
